entries: You died and miraculously returned with knowledge of the realms beyond death and a stronger link to life. Some dead and undead souls might feel a strange, instinctual kinship with you.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.
You gain the {@feat Diehard} feat and the {@feat Additional Lore} feat for {@skill Lore||Boneyard Lore}.
